Room.Name: Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You have come to a desolate corner in the equally desolate hallway.
Room.LongDescription: The corner of the hallway is just as unremarkable as the rest of the hallways you have seen; however, you feel the presense of some evil force at work here. Or maybe it's just the evil assassins in your party planning to backstab one of you for your weapon.
